articles.title: Farewell, Gaia! Spacecraft operations come to an end - European Space Agency
articles.description: The European Space Agency (ESA) has powered down its Gaia spacecraft after more than a decade spent gathering data that are now being used to unravel the secrets of our home galaxy.On 27 March 2025, Gaia’s control team at ESA’s European Space Operations Centr…
articles.content:
